scripts.git: git add . && git commit -m 'add' && git push
scripts.pr: git stash && git pull && composer update && npm i --force && npm run build && sudo chown -R www-data:www-data && sudo chmod -R 775 storage bootstrap/cache && nginx -t && systemctl restart nginx && systemctl restart php8.3-fpm
scripts.all: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,QUEUE" -c "blue,green,magenta" "php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8456" "npm run dev" "bash -c 'while true; do php artisan queue:work --tries=3 --sleep=1; done'"
